comment: Literally one of the nicest professors I've ever had. Let students make up missing work if they seemed legit with their excuses & came to class. always very clear - always went over every concept and made sure class understood. Questions were adored and she made it her job to make sure her students were comprehending the subject. take her!!
If you are good with math you'll be fine. If not she is TERRIBLE. Don't take her

She is very kind and is really there to help. She is happy to answer any questions you have in or out of class. She is great at posting on D2L and replying to e-mails. I would definitely recommend her.

Professor Ibrahim is a very helpful instructor who gives detailed and specific explanations. She also posts worksheets and guides online. She is approachable and fair, so I'd highly recommend taking her class.
She's great, very helpful, and vey willing to help her students out if you need further explanation.  She is also great about posting things on D2L and calculator commands.
I like her method of teaching, She clearly explains problems and has diff method to solve them. I suck at math but coming out of this class i have learnt and understood a lot. Take her
If you are at all good at math you will do GREAT in this class. She gives you plenty of examples in class and a study guide for your exams. Go to class, and you will do great!
Very clear teaching, understanding and helpful.
great teacher.  speak to her, she is willing to help you with any situation.  great step-by-step instruction

Very nice teacher, passionate about her subject.  Has a slight accent and lisp that makes it slightly more difficult to understand, but she is more than happy to repeat herself if necessary. Do the homework, attend class, and review before tests and you will make an A in this class.

She teaches like you're never taken a math class before. She explains it so well and goes over questions in class to where getting an A is easy. You will also honestly learn how to work the problems too. She's so nice. Take this class if possible!
Take her asap to get your "A". She is going back to school I think next year. She is the easiest math instructor I ever had in my life.

TAKE HER!! She took a subject that I HATE and helped me turn it into something I actually enjoy (and have an "A" in). I haven't had a math class in 25 years and I was at best a "C" math student then. Very nice person and very helpful. Great study guides too.
Math 2207: She is a great teacher, really easy. i would take her again if i could
I'm terrible with math and something about the way she approaches the subject made sense to me. Very clear and easy if you attend class and do the webassign. Which is easy!

She's a very sweet lady, always willing to help. She has a slight accent, but nothing that should hinder your learning in her class. I hate math and It's always been my worst subject but this was one of my easiest classes this semester! Easy learning, not too stressful!! :)
She is more than willing to help. Offers alot of extra credit. Attendence is necessary in order to succeed

I took her for both 1101 and 2207 and made A's in both. (and i hate math) Her accent is a little bit of a throw, but her class is easy. Attendance works into your grade, quizzes and tests aren't too hard, plus she offers review sessions and practice versions. Take Her!

Mrs. Ibrahim is a great professor. She gives extra credit, and is always willing 2 help her students with material they don't understand. She gives practice tests, the tests are VERY close to the practice ones. She has a review before tests. She has an attendance policy that is part of your grade. I took her for 2207 and 1101 and Aced both!

Sweet and laid back teacher. Decently easy class. Notes everyday unless there is a test. Grading is fair. If you're decent at math this class should be easy. If not there she is more than willing to help1
No Comments

This teacher is totally pro-student. I hate math and I have a 98 in her class. Notes everyday, 3 tests (they are straight from her notes) gives credit for any work you do even if the answer is wrong. 6 quizzes the whole semester.(EASY) very few HW assignments (worth 5 pts each) Does have a small accent.3 group assignments. She is laidback and GREAT
